title: Strategic Pricing Practices : How to set pricing for your product
description: Uncover the best practices that transform user experience into a powerful brand asset. From value-based models to psychological pricing insights, we explore strategies that captivate your audience. Join us on a concise journey through design, psychology, and business acumen, empowering you to craft pricing strategies that resonate.

title: Author & Designer : CBSE Class 12 IPR
description:
Developed and authored the book titled Informatics Practices Class XII specifically tailored for students of class 12 in the CBSE curriculum.
Designed as a comprehensive resource to assist students in mastering Informatics Practices and staying up-to-date with the latest trends in technology.
Covers a range of topics, including Python programming, data analysis with pandas, data visualization using matplotlib, and database management with SQL.Provides a structured and systematic approach to learning these technologies, ensuring a strong foundation for students.
Incorporates practical examples, exercises, and coding challenges to reinforce concepts and facilitate hands-on learning.
Offers explanations and step-by-step instructions to guide students through complex programming concepts and techniques.

title: OneCard Brand Identity Reimagined
description: Experience the evolution of OneCard as it undergoes a transformative redesign, now infused with a vibrant brand identity. Witness the rebirth of authenticity, professionalism, and modernism, as we redefine the visual language to elevate the user experience. Immerse yourself in the seamless blend of innovation and timeless design, as OneCard emerges not just as a financial tool but as an icon of authenticity and modern professionalism.
